name: Push (Markt & Technik)
overview: A puzzle game by Chrlstopher Glaubwitz published in both 64'er 1990/09, and 64'er Sonderheft 79. He has written a nice strategy game, which looks pretty easy at first glance, but has some difficulties. Please type it with the new MSE (Listing 2) After the start you will see a house with 28 cleverly placed boxes. The main character of the game appears on the top left of the screen and can be brought to life with the joystick in port 2. All crates are now to be pushed to the exit. If you finally manage to do this, the game is finished!
